snippet: In a rare foray into social engineering, Facebook announced a plan to encourage users to list their donor status on their pages, a move that organ transplant experts are calling historic. Read more »
abstract: In a rare foray into social engineering, Facebook announced a plan to encourage users to list their donor status on their pages, a move that organ transplant experts are calling historic. Read more »

headline.main: Facebook Is Urging Members to Add Organ Donor Status
